docs.snippet: Although 14 of the 19 members of the new Government which has taken office in Israel are holdovers, the fact that for the first time the cabinet is headed by a native son, Premier Yitzhak Rabin, and includes Shulamit Aloni, an outspoken dove,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although 14 of the 19 members of the new Government which has taken office in Israel are holdovers, the fact that for the first time the cabinet is headed by a native son, Premier Yitzhak Rabin, and includes Shulamit Aloni, an outspoken dove, indicates profound breaks with the past.
docs.abstract: comment on death of Michael Thomas Gaughan, 1 of 6 IRA member on hunger strike in Brit prisons, holds death may provide new focus for anti-Brit hostility in Ireland; kidnap of Earl of Donoughmore and wife has led to speculation that they are being held as hostages to exch for remaining hunger strikers (S)

docs.snippet: The International Football Federation, overruling European objections, has decided to expand the number of teams for future World Cup soccer finals from 16 to an eventual 24, Argentine and Uruguay officials - said today.
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Football Federation, overruling European objections, has decided to expand the number of teams for future World Cup soccer finals from 16 to an eventual 24, Argentine and Uruguay officials - said today.

docs.snippet: The lure of World Cup soccer drew a high-spirited and diverse crowd of 9,541 to Madison Square Garden yesterday to watch a scoreless tie between Brazil and Yugoslavia on closed-circuit television from Frankfurt, West Germany.

docs.snippet: Looking weak and not particularly proud, Helmut Shoen, the West German soccer coach, told the people of this nation tonight what. they already knew. Leopoldo Valejas, Chile's goalie, could only look at ball after Paul Breitner scored for West Germany...
docs.lead_paragraph: Looking weak and not particularly proud, Helmut Shoen, the West German soccer coach, told the people of this nation tonight what. they already knew. Leopoldo Valejas, Chile's goalie, could only look at ball after Paul Breitner scored for West Germany during World Cup match in Berlin. Goal gave West Germany a victory.

docs.snippet: President Nixon and President Hafez alAssad of Syria announced in Damascus the restoration of diplomatic relations between their countries, which were broken off during the Arab-Israeli war of 1967. They said that this was a first step toward...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Nixon and President Hafez alAssad of Syria announced in Damascus the restoration of diplomatic relations between their countries, which were broken off during the Arab-Israeli war of 1967. They said that this was a first step toward establishing lasting peace in the Middle East. [1:8.]

docs.snippet: many, June 16-Besides security, money seems to be the big thing in this World Cup. The West German squad staged one of those lastminute financial squabbles and other teams, like the Dutch, have been ranting like small boys in a candy shop about their...
docs.lead_paragraph: many, June 16-Besides security, money seems to be the big thing in this World Cup. The West German squad staged one of those lastminute financial squabbles and other teams, like the Dutch, have been ranting like small boys in a candy shop about their financial goodies.
